title: [Large-Scale] Epistemological Approaches to Overcoming Learning Difficulties: Constructivist and Experiential-Based Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of secondary science education and practical experience
context.additional_context: For current secondary science teachers: designing a project-based learning environment using digital devices, focusing on bridging gaps between learners' prior experiences and scientific concepts

learning_goals: Learners develop a framework to analyze discrepancies between daily experiences and scientific concepts
Learners diagnose conceptual errors occurring during project implementation from an epistemological perspective and propose improvements
Learners design educational materials applying constructivist learning principles through peer feedback and reflective practice
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
